title: Camera shaking and screen flickers. Pixel 3 is less than 4 months old!
content: I have tried restarting and resetting my.phone. The back camera shakes when trying to focus and often takes out of focus and blurry pictures. Recently, the screen has also started flashing and flickering out of control at random. Nothing seems to help it, other than time. I purchased my phone a few months ago from the Google store.
